cartoons.title: Kemi's African Adventures
cartoons.description: Follow young Kemi as she discovers the wonders of African wildlife and culture.

cartoons.title: Anansi the Spider
cartoons.description: Classic West African folktales featuring the clever spider Anansi.

cartoons.title: Ubuntu Kids
cartoons.description: Children from different African countries learn about unity and diversity.

stories.title: Why the Sun and Moon Live in the Sky
stories.description: A traditional tale explaining why the sun and moon moved to the sky.
stories.moral: Be considerate of others and think about consequences

stories.title: The Clever Hare and the Elephant
stories.description: How a small hare outwitted a mighty elephant through cleverness.
stories.moral: Intelligence is more powerful than size

stories.title: The Rainbow Bird
stories.description: A magical bird brings colors to the world and teaches about diversity.

stories.title: The Tortoise and the Wisdom Pot
stories.description: Tortoise tries to keep all wisdom for himself but learns about sharing.
stories.moral: Wisdom should be shared with everyone

games.title: African Geography Challenge
games.description: Learn African countries, capitals, and landmarks through interactive games.

games.title: Cultural Memory Match
games.description: Match African cultural items, instruments, and traditional objects.

games.title: African Languages Learning
games.description: Learn basic words and phrases in various African languages.

games.title: African Tribes Trivia
games.description: Test your knowledge about African tribes and their traditions.

coloringPages.title: Traditional African Masks
coloringPages.description: Intricate traditional mask designs to color

coloringPages.title: African Cultural Patterns
coloringPages.description: Beautiful traditional African patterns and symbols

coloringPages.title: African Village Life
coloringPages.description: Scenes from traditional African village life
